tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientReferrals (
  referral_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  specialist_id UUID NOT NULL,
  referral_date DATE NOT NULL,
  referred_to_facility TEXT,
  referral_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT
)

CREATE TABLE specialists (
  specialist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  specialist_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialist_area VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE referrals (
  referral_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  specialist_id INT,
  referral_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_facilities (
  facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(50),
  facility_location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Referrals (
  referral_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  specialist_name VARCHAR,
  referred_date DATE,
  referral_reason TEXT
);
